snippet.title: Moonfall (amiga)
snippet.description:
Intro + gameplay (3:40)

Elite clone with trading and combat. Gameplay recorded from the beginning until death. Lots of trading needs to be done, before there's enough money to buy anything useful besides fuel and missiles. It's relatively easy to get into the game and controls, but I found combat a bit difficult with basic weapons. It wasn't easy to get ships into sights without getting hit a lot first. There should be missions to complete later on with large bounty money. The ultimate goal is to buy the whole moon :P

Cropped the video into WS resolution so logos and intro screen picture at the beginning are not complete.

Publisher: 21st Century Entertainment (1991)

http://www.lemonamiga.com/games/details.php?id=1773
